title: Understanding Financial Contracts
description: A comprehensive introduction to financial contracts, including essential contract elements, legal terminology, reading and interpreting contract language, and understanding basic contract law principles that affect everyday financial decisions.
learning_objectives: Identify the essential elements that make a contract legally binding
Interpret common legal terminology and contract clauses in financial agreements
Analyze contract terms to understand rights, obligations, and potential risks
Evaluate the financial implications of signing different types of contracts
Apply contract literacy skills to protect personal interests in financial transactions

skill_builder.title: Contract Analysis Tool
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students practice identifying contract elements, red flags, and key terms in real-world financial contracts including apartment leases, phone plans, gym memberships, and loan agreements.
